metadata.name: Sunset hope
metadata.description:
The late yellow day-lily burns in the early summer sunset.
The day-lily is a member of the lily family that blooms when the sun is setting.
It has beautiful lemon yellow flowers with a refreshing summer scent.

Near where I live, there is a terraced rice field that still exists as one of the original landscapes of Japan.
There used to be many day-lilies growing wild there, but due to environmental changes and management problems, the number is decreasing every year.
However, due to environmental changes and management issues, the number is decreasing every year.

When I went to see them in July 2021, I could not find a single one.
One day, I would like to see day-lilies blooming gracefully in the evening sun in this terraced paddy field.

初夏の夕日に燃えるユウスゲ。
ユウスゲは日が沈むころに咲くユリ科の植物です。
綺麗なレモンイエローの花で、夏らしい爽やかな良い香りのする植物です。

私の住んでいる場所の近くに日本の原風景として今も現存してる棚田があります。
そこにはかつてユウスゲが多く自生していたようですが、環境の変化や管理の問題で
毎年数が減っています。

2021年7月に見に行った時はひとつも見当たりませんでした。
いつかこの風景のように夕日に照らされ優雅に咲くユウスゲをこの棚田で見てみたいです。
